summary: This is a US Marshals Service prisoner schedule report for the Brooklyn Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) dated July 18, 2019. It details the scheduled movements and court appearances for multiple inmates, including transfers within the facility and court hearings for various offenses. The document is significant as it shows the operational logistics of the detention center on a specific date, but it does not directly mention Jeffrey Epstein or his associates.

events.title: Prisoner Transfers and Court Hearings
events.description: Multiple inmates at Brooklyn MDC are scheduled for internal transfers and various court appearances including sentencing, status hearings, and meetings with AUSAs.

St. Andrews (Mentioned as a proffer location)
keyFacts: The document is a prisoner schedule report for Brooklyn MDC dated July 18, 2019.
It lists multiple inmates by locator number, detailing their scheduled movements, court appearances, offenses, and special cautions.
One inmate (85815054) has a noted violent tendency: 'SUBJECT HAS MADE STATEMENTS INDICATING WILLINGNESS TO COMMIT VIOLENCE ON PERSONS WHO COMPROMISE HIS ALLEGED ILLICIT ACTIVITIES'.
Another inmate (86520054) has a miscellaneous note: 'PRACTICES BOXING'.
The offenses listed for inmates include weapon offenses, dangerous drugs, and fraud, using standardized codes (e.g., 5299, 3599, 2699).
